section.name: Books
section.p: Struts Kick Start by James Turner and Kevin Bedell - Not yet published.
The Struts Framework: Practical Guide for Programmers by Sue Spielman - Not yet published.
Programming Jakarta Struts by Chuck Cavaness - Not yet published. Public review draft online.

Struts in Action by Ted Husted, Cedric Dumoulin, George Franciscus, and David Winterfeldt; Foreword by Craig R. McClanahan - Not yet published. (Formerly "Java Web Development with Struts".) [book site]
Mastering Jakarta Struts by James Goodwill - Not yet published.
Struts Fast Track: J2EE / JSP Framework by Victor Cekvenich - Practical Application with Database Access and Struts Extensions. [book site]

Professional JSP Site Design - Wrox book by Husted, Kunnumpurath, Lavandowska, Panduranga, et al - Features Struts in chapters 2 (The Struts Framework), 6 (Navigation), 8 (Data Access Patterns), 12 (Content Management), 13 (Searching), and 14 (Portals).
JSP and Tag Libraries for Web Development - by Wellington L. S. Da Silva. Several chapters regarding Struts.
Websphere Version 4 Application Development Handbook (PDF) - Chapter 7 covers designing with both the Struts and Websphere frameworks.
Java Server Pages and J2EE Web-based Applications for Enterprises - In German, with a Chapter regarding MVC and Struts.
Core J2EE Patterns - Many of these patterns are deployed in Struts.
Professional JSP 2nd Edition - Wrox book - long chapter on Struts.
Advanced JavaServer Pages by David Geary - Features template tag library from Struts 1.0.
Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Orientated Software by Gama, Helm, Johnson, and Vlissides - Inspired the core patterns used by Struts.
MySQL and JSP Web Applications: Data-Driven Programming Using Tomcat and MySQL by James Turner - Includes a chapter on Tomcat and Struts.
